network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.
server_error: Server error (500). Please try again later.
unauthorized: Authorization error. Please sign in again.
forbidden: Access denied. You don't have permission for this action.
bad_request: Invalid request. Please check your input.
invalid_response: Invalid server response. Please try again.
connection_refused: Connection refused. The server might be unavailable.
contact_support: If the problem persists, please contact support.
item_not_found: The selected item was not found
